code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductDetail(_ref){let{addToCart}=_ref;const{id}=useParams();const[product,setProduct]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/products/".concat(id)).then(res=>setProduct(res.data)).catch(err=>console.error(err));},[id]);if(!product)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["\u20B9",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(product),children:"Add to Cart"})]});}export default ProductDetail;
